Head Blacksmith Vergara:
Although I've only just joined, I already know all of our members by heart!
Let's see, there's *Magister Page* of the Magic Guild in Hunters Village, *Researcher Lorain*, who can be found near the entrance of Cruma Tower, *Warehouse Keeper Hagger* and *Guard Stan* of Oren Castle Town, *Blacksmith Duning* of Hunters Village, *Trader Ralford* under the Ivory Tower in Oren Castle Town,* Head Blacksmith Ferris* in Aden Castle Town, *Warehouse Keeper Collob* in Giran Castle Town, and... hmm, oh yes! *Grocer Pano* in the plaza of Floran Village!
Impressive, eh? But oh so much more impressive now that we have a royal member such as you, my lord!
